quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It doesn't matter how slowly you go as long as you don't stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Everything you want is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Believe in yourself. You're braver than you think.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Your limitation is only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The harder you work, the greater the achievement.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn't find you. You have to go get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: You're never too old to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I am a product of my decisions, not my circumstances.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: You have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: You become the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.text: What you become is more important than what you achieve.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Strive to be of value, not just successful.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
